title: ***SOLD*** FS: Partial name on top T206 Mathewson Dark Cap SGC 40 (3)
author: vintagetoppsguy

posts.post_title: ***SOLD*** FS: Partial name on top T206 Mathewson Dark Cap SGC 40 (3)
posts.post_content: Has Piedmont 350 back.  Back scan available upon request (actually it will be a picture, my scanner is not working).  Looking for $450 delivered or best reasonable offer.  According to CardTarget, the last SGC 40 sold for $499.99 on 4/11/13.

Thank you, Kevin.  

I was asked if this card has any creases, so I looked at it pretty thoroughly under my loupe.  Yes, it does have a crease on the bottom left corner.  It's very faint on the front, but pretty obvious on the back, so I'll call it a back crease.  However, another thing I noticed (that I never saw before) is this card has a partial name on top.  It's hard to see from the scan, but it is there.  I thought this fact might generate more interest.  

Thanks for looking!

David
